head.title: Vimdiff
head.intro: [Vim](http://www.vim.org/) is a very efficient text editor. This reference was made for Vim 8.0.

body.title: Navigating
Editing
body.elms:
| Shortcut | Description | | --- | --- | | `do` | Diff Obtain!
Pull the changes to the current file. | | `dp` | Diff Put!
Push the changes to the other file. | | --- | --- | | `:diffupdate` | Re-scan the files for differences. | | `ZQ` | Quit without checking changes | {: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Folds
body.elms:
| Shortcut      | Description                  |
| ---           | ---                          |
| `zo` _/_ `zO` | Open                         |
| `zc` _/_ `zC` | Close                        |
| `za` _/_ `zA` | Toggle                       |
| ---           | ---                          |
| `zv`          | Open folds for this line     |
| ---           | ---                          |
| `zM`          | Close all                    |
| `zR`          | Open all                     |
| ---           | ---                          |
| `zm`          | Fold more _(foldlevel += 1)_ |
| `zr`          | Fold less _(foldlevel -= 1)_ |
| ---           | ---                          |
| `zx`          | Update folds                 |
{: .-shortcuts}
